Reviews.Title: “Fair place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Patiodadio
Reviews.Content: The staff was very helpful and my room was clean. Over all a fair place to stay, I would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay--even if road access isn't the easiest”
Reviews.Author: JustaHoosier
Reviews.Content: The Jameson Inn-West at W. 38th/I-465 exit is a fine place to stay for us travelers who either can't afford a luxury hotel downtown or refuse to pay for it! You know, the average businessperson or traveler who just wants to stay a night or two--or more--in a nice, comfortable, clean place with a friendly, helpful staff at an affordable price. (Mind you, the rates go up during the Indy 500 on Memorial Day weekend, but they do all over the rmetro area, so...). There are restaurants around--a Cracker Barrel, McDonalds, and more. Nothing fancy, but easy to get to. A word of warning--getting to this hotel is problematical--be sure you are in the right hand lane coming off the interstate so you can find the access road at the first traffic light.

Reviews.Title: “Great Reservation Service”
Reviews.Author: GJV9143W
Reviews.Content: Needed a very short notice hotel reservation in Indy for Christmas Day near the Eagle Creek Airport with special arrangements for coming in by private plane. I made my reservations through Ashlee and she was awesome. She know her stuff inside out, answered all my questions with a smile in her voice and got me a great room rate to boot. Too early to rate the facility but if all the staff is half as helpful as Ashlee, this is going to be an awesome stay.

Reviews.Title: “Super good value for the money.”
Reviews.Author: loriwilkes2
Reviews.Content: This hotel has good reviews for a reason. I booked the hotel via hotwire and got a great price. It had a 2 1/2 star rating which is low because it deserves better. The place is located well, clean, and has pleasant and efficient staff. You can tell that it is managed well.

Reviews.Title: “Surprised... in a good way!”
Reviews.Author: Sheila M
Reviews.Content: I came to Indianapolis to interview for a job. I didn't make reservations. When I got to the hotel, the front desk clerk (Joanie) who later became my saving grace - was checking in a family. She made eye contact with me and stated she'd be with me asap. We chatted a little while she was checking me in. She said that she lived close by and could help if I landed the job. I didn't think much of it, but when I came back in the next night - she asked how my interview went. Very thoughtful. I checked out the next morning and a couple of days later, I received a phone call that I had been hired. I called the hotel and made a reservation, so I could look at apartments. The young man who answered the phone stated that Joanie wasn't it, but he would help me. So he gave me a list of aparment complexes close by. When I checked in the following week, Joanie was again behind the front desk; greeted me with a huge smile and called me by name. The next day, she gave me a list of Indianapolis' do's and don'ts. I know I made the right decision in moving to Indianapolis. If everyone is a friendly as the staff at the Jameson Inn, I won't have any problem fitting in and making new friends. The rooms were great too! Spacious and clean. Robin in housekeeping attending to my every need. The breakfast was free and had wonderful waffles and biscuits and gravy. The hotel pool was sparking and relaxing of a long day of interviewing and apartment hunting. When family and friends come to visit - they will definitely stay here. Too bad they're not nationwide. I've found a hotel chain for life!

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable room; Good employees”
Reviews.Author: seeker1866
Reviews.Content: Four day stay; room was comfortable and the location was good for our needs. Summer heat was easily handled by the A/C; bath water always hot and plentiful. The employee servicing the room did an excellent job. Front desk personnel were helpful and professional. The breakfast was somewhat light; cereal, milk, fruit, yogurt, biscuit & gravy - but was free. Building well maintained; parking convenient. Wifi worked very well. Room TV wasn't flatscreen but had good picture and good channel selection. The bed was comfortable. I would not hesistate to stay here again. We walked next door to the Crackerbarrel Restaurant, and there were six more restaurants and/or fast food places very close by. We didn't make it to the pool; but did see the exercise room.

Reviews.Title: “Really friendly service, nice breakfast.”
Reviews.Author: Heythereacceptthis
Reviews.Content: I recently came back to Indianapolis to look for an apartment. A friend had suggested this hotel for me to stay at. Thinking of all the surrounding hotels I had gone to in the past for races and things, lets just say my expectations were not high. But little to my surprise the value was more than worth the price. Once I came in it was a little early and the nice, clean boy behind the counter was very kind and greeted me with a "Hello." walking in the the door. As I was checking in, I told him that I was looking for close by apartments, because I was moving back home. He was able to get me a whole list of NICE close apartments and check me in, WHILE naming off the hotels info. It was very kind of him to do. Once I got to the room it was in good condition. Clean. Comfy bed. (needed a nicer TV though ;) Went out for a swim, while setting up appointments with local apartments. And I got a VERY nice apartment from the first page of listings. During the rest of my stay there was a lot of other great and helpful staff there is well. Thank you all and Eric for making my stay at Jameson great! I will suggest you all to my family and friends.

Reviews.Title: “Bad Experience”
Reviews.Author: amblessed
Reviews.Content: Wow, looking at the other reviews, you wouldn't think this was the same place! The lobby was clean and very pretty looking. But in our room, the sheets had unwashed linen, stains on the sheets, makeup on the pillowcases, makeup on the towels, and washcloths that looked like you dusted with them. There were also stains on the carpets. Very disappointing, But I went back to the desk, and the clerk was very friendly and apologetic and gave us a different room. This room was better, but still had one sheet that was stained looking and a towel that was dirty looking. The clerk gave me more towels that seemed better. The beds themselves were very comfortable.. Breakfast the next morning was very good. Also, there were two ice machines side by side....neither had ice in them. Don't think we will stay here again or recommend it.

Reviews.Title: “Surprised in a good way!”
Reviews.Author: boiler_mom1968
Reviews.Content: My husband and I were visiting family in Indianapolis and we didn't make arrangements for a place to stay, so we just drove around the area checking out hotels. We found the Jameson (after looking at a couple other very unsavory hotels in the area). Overall we were very happy with our final choice. The staff was nice, the beds were great and the free breakfast in the morning had more than the usual coffee and doughnuts.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel & very cozy!”
Reviews.Author: colleenleopard
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed at the Jameson the first weekend in October. It is a very nice hotel right off highway 465 which is close to all the restaurants & there is a nice grocery store called Marsh right across the street from it that's open 24 hrs. The hotel staff was nice & friendly too. The room was very clean & cozy. My only complaint is that housekeeping somehow didn't make it around to clean our room - so we didn't have fresh towels the next day, but overall, I would recommend this hotel to my family & friends when traveling to Indianapolis. Thank you!

Reviews.Title: “Would definitely stay here again.”
Reviews.Author: GoStateGo
Reviews.Content: Our group had about 20 room/nights over an eight day period, attending an event at the State Fairgrounds. Excellent value, quality accommodations, good service. No complaints. Numerous family restaurants nearby (Cracker Barrel, Ruby Tuesday, TGI Friday's, Chili's, etc.) Would stay here again, for sure.

Reviews.Title: “Happy we came here”
Reviews.Author: emrwb
Reviews.Content: I use Hotwire a lot. They had this paricular hotel as our stop on the way back home from a vacation in Tennesse. I have travel extensively in my carrier, and I got to say, this hotel was one of the best. Quiet, clean, great value, friendly staff, and convenient. They have weel appointed furnishings thru out the property...little things like bigger TV's in rooms, waffle breakfast, and floor coverings giving one a sense of 'home'. Warm and inviting. Upon check we asked for a good place to eat, the desk clerk sent us to a cool resturant 1/2mi away. Had a steak dinner on a deck overlooking a marina&lake. An evening we will not forget, and we shall return. Thanks Jameson Inns!

Reviews.Title: “This hotel was OK but I'm not sure I would stay here again.”
Reviews.Author: 50_Star
Reviews.Content: The room was larger than I expected and comfortable. The staff seemed very nice. I'm sure they get a lot of their customers from the nearby race track. With so many hotels to choose from I don't think this would be my first choice. The Customer I was with booked the hotel rooms for us.

Reviews.Title: “Driving through”
Reviews.Author: txtaylor5
Reviews.Content: Glad to find a Jameson Inn - good rooms (larger than previously visited Inn's), and biscuits and gravy. Staff very friendly and accomodating for having to work Christmas Eve and Day. Another good experience at the Inn. Reasonable rate - before all the taxes?!

Reviews.Title: “Old Hotel with cheap remodeling”
Reviews.Author: MrCracker
Reviews.Content: Hotel has old look to it- security door on one side of hotel does not work. Bathroom old and tiny. Beds uncomfortable- you are better sleeping on the floor.

Reviews.Title: “convenient off interstate 465 and close to Indy 500”
Reviews.Author: bigdog575
Reviews.Content: Offers Belgian waffles for breakfast Huge rooms- I had a king size bed-nice mattress Some rooms have microfridge-great feature convenient location to interstate 465

HotelInfo.Name: Jameson Inn Indy West
HotelInfo.Address: 3850 Eagle View Drive, Indianapolis, IN 46254
